I might have to switch again now. It's just my own personal belief that supporting Centralised Bitmain ASIC miners is very negative for the network and community as a whole and the networks will suffer once Bitmain takes over, which they mostly control already. The writing is on the wall. I just don't want to support Bitmain growing any stronger.
